Text: By  HeartlandNews  -  2  0  Facebook  Twitter  Pinterest  WhatsApp  Linkedin  ReddIt  Telegram  Digg  In 2014, Michigan resident Uri Rafaeli underpaid property taxes on a rental unit he owned by $8.43. For his oversight, Oakland County seized his property and sold it at auction for $24,500.
